intra-week Market reversal profiles that for the uninitiated or the uninformed there are many times caught off guard by the likelihood of a potential reversal and early on in my career I had these events as well and it plagued me it was one of those things that just kept coming up all the time I'd have a trade it was profitable it would be working for me and then something would happen midweek and it would completely reverse and I would hope and pray that it would get back in sync with what I was expecting to see as a long-term trade and it didn't happen it came back and rolled right up against me and either stopped me out or pressured me so much that I had to get out of the trade if you've never experienced this you will eventually so it's important we cover it now one of the hardest things for me to teach when it comes to Market profiling is the market reversal profile because I have to teach not just one element of trading or discipline of trading but I have to teach a multiple approach either swing trading short-term trading day trading or position trading swing trading and short-term trading something to that effect so it can't be understood as efficiently as it would be as if the student or the trader was well versed in more than one trading discipline so when I was teaching on the forums years ago and I was sharing my information on YouTube and on my own discount it doesn't do it over the course of the entire week no no it does this in a matter of 24 hours so as the market in this case the cable British pound USD trades over 200 points in a period of 24 hours the market reaches for a level with speed for a particular reason and when you look at the daily chart here we've outlined the PD arrays and you can see that there's a daily bullish order block mean threshold and price reaches right into that on Wednesday of the week of this recording when we see a fast Market we have to immediately assume that they're reaching for a level institutional order flow that is highly critical for efficiency on the interbank level now that may be in the form of Commerce globally or it could be in the form of a repricing at the Central Bank level either one of those could happen rather quickly and while it took some time to gradually drift down over the 24-hour time period for that whole entire range to form between Tuesday going into Wednesday's low the idea is you're going to anticipate at the beginning of the week a certain outcome and it's prudent that you stick to that okay because over the course of a career you're going to
